casebody.data:
Walter Lee RAMSEY, Jr., Employee
v.
SOUTHERN INDUSTRIAL CONSTRUCTORS INCORPORATED, Employer Reliance Insurance Company, Carrier and
Gallagher Basset Services, Incorporated, Third-Party Administrator. No. 485P06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 14, 2006. W. Scott Fuller, Meredith T. Black, Raleigh, for Southern Industrial, et al. Douglas B. Johnson, New Bern, for Ramsey. Prior report: ___ N.C.App. ___, 630 S.E.2d 681 .

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 6th day of September 2006 by Defendants in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 14th day of December 2006."
